info.narration: #0 Staff enters the $0 room to begin work.

collection.name: Answer
The Dead Answer
collection.openText: To protect the 'answer' they had reached, they clad themselves in heavy armor.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work results were poor, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
When the work results were good, the Qliphoth Counter increased with a very low probability.
Each time a specific ordeal occurred, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.

During $0's escape, $0 occasionally used a cannon connected to <Redacted>. The cannon was extremely lethal, and employees targeted by it often died in many cases. However, employees with high physical abilities or those who took specific actions had a relatively higher survival rate.
